name: Fallout: New Vegas - Honest Hearts
description:
Fallout: New Vegas - Honest Hearts is an action-RPG game developed by Obsidian Entertainment. It was originally released in 2011. It was published by Bethesda Softworks. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Fallout: New Vegas - Honest Hearts on PC, PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360.
